column5: Just when I thought I had this go pro under wraps, I screwed up this morning  Thought I had lots of perch ripp,n video, but all was for not.  Still managed to get some video together of this morning,,,,,,,,,,,,      Told ya I had Simon beat,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,BORING
It was a good day on the toons
Yup it was.  Got some, kicked up a notch dry batter, and some garlic/coconut  panko for the fish fry. Oh ya, double fried taters to add.

Was that you guys heading back out around noon ish from smith's bay?  I only saw one toon with an electric pusher as I drove by, seemed to be heading out from the docks towards the narrows.  Edit - should have watched the video first - that ain't smiths bay!   Michael
Looks like you need a pilots licence to run that toon Brian. Thanks for the video can you do one on your fishing machine sometime please.   Art

Got some, kicked up a notch dry batter, and some garlic/coconut  panko for the fish fry. Oh ya, double fried taters to add.  Talk about some good and new eats. It never ends. That coconut addition to the Panko, was a nice sweet additive. Perch macaroons. LOL   Was that you guys heading back out around noon ish from smith's bay?  I only saw one toon with an electric pusher as I drove by, seemed to be heading out from the docks towards the narrows.  Edit - should have watched the video first - that ain't smiths bay!   Michael   Having big breakfast this morning michael? LOL  Need to get up your way again to explore.   Looks like you need a pilots licence to run that toon Brian. Thanks for the video can you do one on your fishing machine sometime please.   Art  It,s a simple set up Art. Load up, drop in the water and float an fish.  Will try to do something up next time out.
You will now be known as Bspeilberg!

Just when I thought I had this go pro under wraps, I screwed up this morning  Thought I had lots of perch ripp,n video, but all was for not.  Still managed to get some video together of this morning,,,,,,,,,,,,      Told ya I had Simon beat,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,BORING    LOL....dont quite know how to respond Brian.
We need to see a fish off for a winner?
LOL....dont quite know how to respond Brian.  Was not personal,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,, LOL
We need to see a fish off for a winner?   I dont have lakes filled with fish like Simon. LOL
I dont have lakes filled with fish like Simon. LOL  LOL, I always forget that distance issue you folks have to deal with.
